laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase was elevated at 129.0 IU/L (normal range: 0.0 - 100.0 IU/L).
Gallbladder wall is thickened, irregular, edematous, and progressively hyperenhancing. There is cholelithiasis and a suspected 3 mm stone within the proximal cystic duct.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild atelectatic changes at the lung bases without pleural effusion were noted. No definitive choledocholithiasis found.
